article_text: Every Friday, the Courier posts a retro photo on our Facebook page and readers give us their memories of that place. We call it "Flashback Fridays." To share your memories, check us out on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/wcfcourier

article_metadata.description: This month, Dave Nagle is looking at the historical significance of the Iowa caucuses.
article_metadata.author: DAVE NAGLE

og.description: This month, Dave Nagle is looking at the historical significance of the Iowa caucuses.
og.title: The angriest campaign ever

article_summary:
Every Friday, the Courier posts a retro photo on our Facebook page and readers give us their memories of that place.
To share your memories, check us out on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/wcfcourier
We call it "Flashback Fridays."
